CustomDomains

CustomDomains

CustomDomains
NOTE: An instance of this class is automatically created for an
instance of the CdnManagementClient.
Initializes a new instance of the CustomDomains class.

Constructor

new CustomDomains(client)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
client CdnManagementClient

Reference to the service client.
Source:
  • operations/customDomains.js, line 28

Methods

beginCreate(customDomainName, endpointName, profileName, resourceGroupName, hostName, optionsopt, callback) → {function}

Creates a new CDN custom domain within an endpoint.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
customDomainName string

Name of the custom domain within an
endpoint.
endpointName string

Name of the endpoint within the CDN profile.
profileName string

Name of the CDN profile within the resource
group.
resourceGroupName string

Name of the resource group within the
Azure subscription.
hostName string

The host name of the custom domain. Must be a
domain name.
options object <optional>

Optional Parameters.

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
customHeaders object <optional>

Headers that will be added to the
request
callback function
Source:
  • operations/customDomains.js, line 473

callback(err, result, request, response)

                 {Error}  err        - The Error object if an error occurred, null otherwise.

                 See CustomDomain for more information.

                 {object} [request]  - The HTTP Request object if an error did not occur.

                 {stream} [response] - The HTTP Response stream if an error did not occur.
